description:
My place is close to Museum of the Moving Image, United Artists Kaufman Astoria 14, Restaurants and plenty of bars. I live 1 block from the R/M at 46th street and it takes less than 15 minutes to reach Manhattan. The apartment is on the 2nd floor and has a sweet balcony. I also have 2 dogs and welcome small dogs as visitors as well! Cats are fine too. Really cozy place. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and furry friends (pets).

When you stay at Casa del French Bulldog--you will feel comfy and cozy!
Included:
Cable--please do not order movies!!!
Wifi--i will give you password upon renting
Shampoo/Body wash/Towels 
Coffee--please let me know what milk to take!
Balcony--feel free to use it, even if its chilly!
Fur babies--I have 2 small French Bulldogs--i have a guest dog bed, treats and play pen if you have a little one that is crate trained!
Record Player--feel free to channel Don Drapper and the oldies.

You can use the whole place!

I prefer to meet you with keys or can arrange to leave them locally for you. If you need recommendations for the area, i would be happy to assist!

24 hour rite aide and health food market across the street!!!! AMAZING.

The apartment is a black and a half from the R/M train. Super conveinent
name: Entire Astoria 1BD with balcony!
review: Jessys place is amazing. It's walking distance to many nice restaurants in Astoria and to the train to manhattan. It's great for couples and to top it off she's a great host and will answer any questions needed! Whenever I come back to New York, I will definitely see if jessys place is available first.
